meanings.definition: A white grape variety used to make a type of wine.
meanings.sent1: The riesling grape is known for producing delicious wine.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy a glass of riesling with my dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the riesling grape refuse to play music? Because it preferred to be pressed for wine!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a bottle of riesling being uncorked.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ripe riesling filled the room, enticing everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: A type of white wine made from the riesling grape.
meanings.sent1: The riesling is a popular choice for those who prefer white wine.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a glass of riesling to pair with her seafood dish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the riesling wine go to school? To get better with age!
meanings.sent4: The golden hue of the riesling shimmered in the sunlight like liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The crisp taste of riesling danced on her taste buds, leaving a refreshing finish.

meanings.sent1: Farmers carefully tend to the riesling grape to ensure a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent2: The riesling grape is known for its versatility in winemaking.
meanings.sent3: Why did the riesling grape break up with the cabernet sauvignon grape? It found a sweeter companion!
meanings.sent4: The riesling grape glistened like tiny pearls under the morning dew.
meanings.sent5: Each riesling grape on the vine seemed to whisper promises of a delightful wine.
